statement.p: Find the perimeter and area of the parallelogram above. Side lengths are measurements.

solution.p: Perimeter is the sum of the sides: \displaystyle{2}{\left({5.45}+{6.51}\right)}={23.92}\approx{23.92}.
Area is height times base (side perpendicular to height): \displaystyle{6.51}\cdot{4.90}={31.899}\approx{31.9}.
